wikitext.*:
'''Nickel Creek''' is an American acoustic bluegrass trio, formed in 1989 in California and disbanded in 2007.  They have recorded the song ''House of Tom Bombadil'' which was inspired by [[Tom Bombadil]], appearing in their third album, called Nickel Creek.
